message: Let's be fair and split the money. I propose a 60/40 split to your advantage, Bob.  We can avoid the risk of inflation eating away at our gains.
I appreciate your generosity Alice, but I think we can do better. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, but I'm open to negotiation.
Bob, let's be realistic. We both lose if this drags on. I'm proposing a 55/45 split, still in your favor. Take it before inflation eats away at this offer too!
